name: androgyny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an appearence that is not clearly male or female: One or two of the earlier photos reveal an intriguing androgyny not normally associated with the actress. He's one of those performers who was androgynous before androgyny was cool. See
androgynous
More examplesFewer examplesAndrogyny seems to go in and out of style among rock and pop musicians.A corner of the fashion world has always designed clothes having a casual androgyny.She still dresses with the quirky androgyny that made her a star.
